text: i manage the client engineering team at
amazon
and that team is responsible for

devices that amazon employees use to do

on

provision
applications for users virtually when
they don't require

so we don't have to deny those those you

from our customers because we don't have

just
easy and low effort in the workspaces
console
one of the great things about amazon
workspaces is the consistency of the

workspace
is as simple as moving your mouse
between one window and another
on your desktop you're not having to

product
we have all of the power and capacity

and also to scale up to meet demand in

that's something you can actually

amazon workdocs is a amazon cloud-based
uh
document storage and collaboration
solution we use it inside of amazon
as as our principal way of sharing and
storing all the documents that we write
we have over 200 000 users using
workdocs today
with over three petabytes of data in our
workbox account
doing what we used to do which was
having on-premise file servers
filled some of the organization and
security gaps that we had when
it was just an email-based methodology
but we also inherited
a whole host of operational debt
associated with maintaining on-premise

docs
all of those challenges were abstracted
away because workdocs manages those

repository for our documents
